definition: invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
to invite/to request/to intercept/to solicit/to seek
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Pro-gamers from all over the world have traveled to BlizzCon to participate in the Invitational .
sentences.chinese: 来自世界各地的职业选手都来参加到了这次的邀请赛。

sentences.english: The invitational football match was snowed off.
sentences.chinese: 那场足球邀请赛因下大雪被取消了。

sentences.english: The International Table Tennis Friendship Invitational Tournament will be held in China this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年的国际乒乓球友谊邀请赛将在中国举行。

sentences.english: China Cup International Gymnastics Tournament opened yesterday in Beijing Capital Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 中国杯国际体操邀请赛昨天在北京首都体育馆开赛。

sentences.english: The tournament will be composed of out-door plaza exhibition and in-door ones.
sentences.chinese: 邀请赛由室外广场展示与室内展厅展出二部分组成。

sentences.english: The Sultan"s Cup is an invitational tournament for teams of Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 苏丹杯则是东南亚队伍的邀请赛。

sentences.english: Fan Jing River Township, a few years ago is still held in Jiaxing city, riding a white boat Invitational.
sentences.chinese: 前几年还在范泾乡举行了嘉兴市踏白船邀请赛。

sentences.english: Beijing International Swimming and Diving Friendship Invitational Meet opened today.
sentences.chinese: 北京国际游泳跳水友好邀请赛今天开幕了。

definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
